description: I. Letter dated 18/06/2010 from Mela Watts (Director of Local Improvement and Performance Group, Schools Directorate) to Rachel Wolf (Director, New Schools Network) regarding support for free school applicants. 2 p. II. Letter dated 25/06/2010 from Lord Hill of Oareford to Baroness Warmsley regarding free schools and details of the grant for the New Schools Network. 1 p.
